hero.title: The Legend of Mighty Paws
hero.subtext: A journey through time, taste, and tradition.

story.title: Where History Meets Modernity
story.paragraph1: Founded in 1924 by a legendary baker who was always accompanied by his giant, friendly mastiff, Mighty Paws began as a small hearth in the heart of the city. The 'Mighty Paws' name was a tribute to the silent companion who stood guard over the sourdough starters.
story.paragraph2: Today, we blend that century-old heritage with modern culinary innovation. Our wood-fired ovens are the same ones used generations ago, but our flavors are boundary-pushing and global.
